activities: As part of arcgis.com’s Web-based applications and platform services provided via http://www.arcgis.com, customers are permitted to submit electronic data and information, including personal data, to arcgis.com’s servers. In this context, arcgis.com acts as a data processor and does not determine how its customers’ data is utilized in arcgis.com’s servers. Arcgis.com does not choose or determine the types of data that are submitted to arcgis.com’s servers, and any access to or use of such data by arcgis.com is incidental to completing the contractual obligations of arcgis.com, as data processor, to its customers. As part of arcgis.com’s internal operations, arcgis.com transfers personal data of its current and prospective customers and current and prospective business partners to arcgis.com’s U.S. data centers for processing and storage. Arcgis.com collects, transfers, and uses personal data of its current and prospective customers and current and prospective partners for sales, billing, marketing, and business partner recruitment purposes. In this context, arcgis.com acts as a data controller.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
